players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice - Bob's death is concerning. We need to be very careful about our vote today since there are only three of us left. Does anyone have any insights about what happened?"
Charlie: "Diana, you've been very quiet. In a game this small, silence can be suspicious. What are your thoughts on who might be the mafioso among us?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice - Bob's death is concerning. We need to be very careful about our vote today since there are only three of us left. Does anyone have any insights about what happened?"
Charlie: "Diana, you've been very quiet. In a game this small, silence can be suspicious. What are your thoughts on who might be the mafioso among us?"
